thread.title: Police Scotland crackdown on speeding described as 'state surveillance gone mad'
thread.title_full: Police Scotland crackdown on speeding described as 'state surveillance gone mad'

author: Auslan Cramb
title: Police Scotland crackdown on speeding described as 'state surveillance gone mad'
text: Police Scotland crackdown on speeding described as 'state surveillance gone mad' Motorists caught just over speed limit will be give official warnings six-month pilot project Sir Stephen House makes speeding a top priority Photo: DANNY LAWSON/PA By Auslan Cramb , Scottish Correspondent 7:17PM BST 06 Jul 2015
